description: Try our easy to follow Malted Choc-Chip Cookie Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Malted ChocChip Cookie Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 190Â°C. Grease a 21x31cm slice tray and line with baking paper.

Beat butter and sugar together in a bowl with electric beaters until pale and creamy. Add eggs and vanilla and beat until combined. Sift flour, malt and baking powder together. Stir into butter mixture with choc bits.
Spread dough in prepared tray, smoothing the surface. Bake for 4045 minutes until golden. Cool in tray.
Trim the edges. Place the melted chocolate in a small snaplock bag and seal. Snip off one corner and drizzle chocolate over slice. Allow to set before cutting into pieces.
